thread.title: Video shows flirty exchange with Costa Coffee barista
thread.title_full: Video shows flirty exchange with Costa Coffee barista

title: Video shows flirty exchange with Costa Coffee barista
text: 'Our lass is going to kill me!' Moment a very enthusiastic Costa Coffee barista flirts with a customer almost getting him in VERY hot water with his girlfriend Ciaran Devlin made a stop off for a caffeine fix at Wolviston service station The 20-year-old was greeted by a cheerful female barista at the drive-thru She said in the video: 'What can I get you on this mighty fine super Sunday? Ciaran, from Billingham, gets into the spirit of the exchange by replying exuberantly: 'Well my darling, I fancy a caramel latte'
